actions.critical_low: Low oil pressure: Potential pump failure, worn bearings, or low oil level. Check immediately.
actions.warning_high: High oil pressure: Potential oil path block or sensor error.

actions.warning_low: Sensor error: Reading below operational minimum.
actions.critical_high: Overheating risk: Danger of engine seizure; monitor for engine oil pressure increase.

actions.warning_low: Sensor error: Inefficient firing temperature detected.
actions.critical: Engine overheating: Danger of engine seizure. Check coolant leak or fan failure.

actions.critical_low: Low boost: Air leak issue or turbocharger block detected.
actions.warning_high: High boost: Potential damage to air intake modules.

actions.critical_low: Low pressure: Clogged fuel filter or path leaks detected.
actions.critical_high: High pressure: Faulty control valve or pressure relief valve stuck.

actions.critical_low: Low supply: Feed pump fault, air in fuel line, or clogged fuel filter.
actions.critical_high: High supply: Sensor error or block in fuel return line.

actions.critical: Return restriction: Check for blockages in the return line.

actions.warning: Suction restriction: Fuel filter likely clogged.

actions.critical_high: System overheating: Check for pathline blocks, pump issues, or damaged components.

actions.critical: Pilot circuit/Pump issue: Pressure below required unload threshold.

actions.critical_low: Low pressure: Hydraulic leak or pump failure.
actions.critical_high: High pressure: Relief valve malfunction or discharge block.

actions.critical_low: Low pressure: Hydraulic leak or hose damage.
actions.critical_high: High pressure: Relief valve malfunction, blocked hydraulic line, or control valve issue.

actions.critical_low: Low pressure: Pump weakness, hydraulic leak, or swing motor malfunction.
actions.critical_high: High pressure: Blocked return line, relief valve malfunction, or stuck control spool.

actions.critical_low: Low pressure: Hydraulic oil leak or travel motor malfunction.
actions.critical_high: High pressure: Blocked return line, relief valve fault, or overloaded tracks.

actions.warning: Sensor/Calibration error: Electrical fault or high-altitude mismatch.
Fuel low: Refill required to prevent air intake.

actions.critical_low: Low oil level: Check for leakages immediately.
actions.warning_high: Sensor error or engine fault detected.
